commands.name: az dynatrace monitor create
commands.syntax:
az dynatrace monitor create --monitor-name
                            --resource-group
                            [--environment]
                            [--identity]
                            [--location]
                            [--monitoring-status {Disabled, Enabled}]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--plan-data]
                            [--subscription-status {Active, Suspended}]
                            [--tags]
                            [--user-info]
examples: az dynatrace monitor create -g rg -n monitor --user-info "{first-name:Alice,last-name:Bobab,email-address:Alice@microsoft.com,phone-number:1234567890,country:US}" --plan-data "{usage-type:committed,billing-cycle:Monthly,plan-details:azureportalintegration_privatepreview@TIDhjdtn7tfnxcy,effective-date:2022-08-20}" --environment "{single-sign-on:{aad-domains:['abc']}}"

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor delete
commands.syntax:
az dynatrace monitor delete [--ids]
                            [--monitor-name]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--subscription]
                            [--yes]
examples: az dynatrace monitor delete -n monitor -g rg -y

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor get-metric-status
examples: az dynatrace monitor get-metric-status --resource-group rgDynatrace --monitor-name fhcjxnxumkdlgpwanewtkdnyuz

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor get-sso-detail
commands.summary: Get the SSO configuration details from the partner.
examples: az dynatrace monitor get-sso-detail -g rg --monitor-name monitor  --user-principal Alice@microsoft.com

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor get-vm-host-payload
commands.summary: Return the payload that need to be passed in the request body for installing Dynatrace agent on a VM.
examples: az dynatrace monitor get-vm-host-payload -g rg --monitor-name monitor

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor list
commands.summary: List all monitor resource by monitor name in a resource group.
examples: az dynatrace monitor list -g rg --monitor-name monitor

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor list-app-service
commands.summary: Get list of app services with dynatrace PaaS OneAgent enabled.
examples: az dynatrace monitor list-app-service -g rg --monitor-name monitor

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor list-host
commands.summary: List the compute resources currently being monitored by the dynatrace resource.
examples: az dynatrace monitor list-host -g rg --monitor-name monitor

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor list-linkable-environment
commands.summary: Get all the dynatrace environments that a user can link a azure resource to.
examples: az dynatrace monitor list-linkable-environment -g rg --monitor-name monitor --user-principal Alice@microsoft.com --region eastus2euap

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor list-monitored-resource
commands.summary: List the resources currently being monitored by the dynatrace monitor resource.
examples: az dynatrace monitor list-monitored-resource -g rg --monitor-name monitor

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor show
examples: az dynatrace monitor show -g rg -n monitor

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
